item.title: Handling Dates and Times in R
item.description: The other day I requested my rides data to Uber (here). They replied with a convenient csv file containing detailed information of every ride I took between 2016 and 2019. The dataset included dates and times in UTC format. I used this dataset to try some functions of the lubridate package for handling dates and times in R. # Load packages library(tidyverse) library(lubridate) The dataset Let’s start by importing the dataset.
